title: Life Hacks With Judge John Hodgman
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are in chambers this week to clear the docket! They talk about theater worthy movies, snow plowing, traveling while sick, wearing high school letter jackets as an adult, and bed times! Plus a letter in response to a previous docket case on sock folding.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
